Terrorsaur/Rowdy Wolf:






Terrorsaur followed Drillbit, watching his scanners. He wasn't happy with 
crawling on his hands and knees. He was used to the air. Here, he was 
grounded. "Go left," he said to Drillbit.


Rowdy Wolf looked at KitKat and pinned his ears back. "I'm worried too, but 
Quickstrike's a survivor." He ducked his head and followed Drillbit and 
Terrorsaur.
